title: Anxiety First Aid Kit
description: Essential tools for managing anxiety in the moment and building long-term calm

questions.question: What is the purpose of the anxiety response?
options: To protect you from perceived threats
To prevent you from taking action

questions.question: What does the 4-7-8 breathing technique help with?
options: Activating the parasympathetic nervous system for calm

subtitle: Calm in your pocket when you need it most
